name: Portfolio
description: Showcasing a collection of my web development projects, this portfolio highlights my skills in front-end technologies such as React and Tailwind CSS. It features responsive design, intuitive navigation, and interactive elements that demonstrate my ability to create user-friendly applications. Each project includes detailed information about the technologies used and links to live demos and source code. This portfolio not only reflects my journey as a developer but also serves as a testament to my commitment to continuous learning and improvement in web development.

name: Travello
description: Travello is a travel booking application built with React, Tailwind CSS, and DaisyUI. This application allows users to explore available tourist spots, view detailed pricing and facility information, and book plans directly. Key features include smooth navigation, form handling, and instant notifications for booking confirmations, creating an engaging and user-friendly experience.

name: Lazy's Bar and Restaurant
description: it's a dynamic Meal & Drinks Menu App using React, featuring real-time API data integration from TheMealDB and TheCocktailDB. Implemented user authentication with Firebase, including email-password and Google Sign-In options. The app allows users to search meals and drinks by category, view detailed preparation steps through modals, and watch recipe videos embedded from YouTube for an interactive experience. Designed a modern and responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI, ensuring a smooth user experience.

name: LazyKitchen
description: it's a dynamic Meal App using React, featuring real-time API data integration from TheMealDB  The app allows users to search meals by category, view detailed preparation steps through modals. Designed a modern and responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI, ensuring a smooth user experience.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Web Clone
description:
This is a clone of Apple's iPhone 15 Pro website using React.js and TailwindCSS. It highlights the effective use of GSAP (Greensock Animations) and Three.js for displaying iPhone 15 Pro models in various colors and shapes.

ðŸ‘‰ Beautiful Subtle Smooth Animations using GSAP: Enhanced user experience with seamless and captivating animations powered by GSAP.

ðŸ‘‰ 3D Model Rendering with Different Colors and Sizes: Explore the iPhone 15 Pro from every angle with dynamic 3D rendering, offering various color and size options.

ðŸ‘‰ Custom Video Carousel (made with GSAP): Engage users with a unique and interactive video carousel developed using GSAP for a personalized browsing experience.

ðŸ‘‰ Completely Responsive: Consistent access and optimal viewing on any device with a fully responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.

And many more features, including thoughtful code architecture and reusability.

name: Brainwave-Web
description:
Brainwave - Modern UI/UX website, developed using React.js and Tailwind CSS, exemplifies modern UI/UX principles. Its sleek design, seamless animations, and overall user experience set a high standard, serving as a reference or inspiration for future modern applications or websites in general.

ðŸ‘‰ Beautiful Sections: Includes hero, services, features, how to use, roadmap, pricing, footer, and header.

ðŸ‘‰ Parallax Animations: Engaging effects triggered by mouse movement and scrolling.

ðŸ‘‰ Complex UI Geometry: Utilizes tailwindcss for intricate shapes like circular feature displays, grid lines, and side lines.

ðŸ‘‰ Latest UI Trends: Incorporates modern design elements such as bento grids.

ðŸ‘‰ Cool Gradients: Enhances visuals with stylish gradients using Tailwind CSS for cards, buttons, etc.

ðŸ‘‰ Responsive: Ensures seamless functionality and aesthetics across all devices

and many more, including code architecture and reusability
